item.title: 31 things
item.description:
01.

I like that you don’t mind the fact that I’ve told my family about you. To me, that means your boyfriend would never feel trapped and urged into hiding things from either side, except for what’s reasonably private or sensitive, obviously.


02.

I like that you are a mother first and foremost, all the while never forgetting about yourself. It’s a hard thing to pull off and it commands admiration.


03.

I like how your smile is a signature personality trait. You express your concerns, fears and sorrows, but you keep your spirit up no matter how they make you feel, no matter what.


04.

I like how you style your hair. It makes you shine, every single day.


05.

I like that you’re not picky about food. Your enjoyment of eating is far more related to the company around you than the meal itself. A person spending that time with you feels like they’re special as a result.


06.

I like that you want what your boys want, and don’t trace a path in advance for them. You listen, respond and act on that feeling. The house project is a good example of that.


07.

I like that you loved Loki and constantly reminded people of how she was best approached. You always treated her the same way I did.
